fields.name: Cliffs of Fire
fields.description: The high priest of Kathros needs help, and only a Free Adventurer can take the job. Journey to the Cliffs of Fire to stop the renegade priest Elrem and recover the lost magic sceptre.
fields.intro_text:
In the small city of Kathros in West Eamon, the high priest's sacred white sceptre has been stolen by the evil renegade priest, Elrem. He has fled south to the Cliffs of Fire, and using the powers of the sceptre, built himself a tower and created monsters to defend it. If Elrem is given time to unlock the sceptre's full powers, he will destroy the entire city!

In the sceptre's absence, crime is returning to Kathros and overrunning the city...

The high priest of Kathros has come to the Free Adventurersâ€™ Guild to find an adventurer willing to brave the dangers of the cliffs and the tower and bring the sceptre back. The task has fallen into your hands.

You will be delivered to the coast by boat and from there you must make your way up into the cliffs and find the tower. The boatmen will bring you back to the guild at any time. However, the longer you take, the greater the threat will become...

Good luck!

fields.name: In a quiet cove
fields.description: You are in a quiet cove, the ocean lapping slowly at the beach from the west. A humid wind washes over you from the southeast and to the north is your pick-up point. The beach continues to the south and a sandy path goes east.

fields.name: On a sandy overshadowed trail
fields.description: You stand on a sandy trail which goes west back onto the beach and south into dense scrub. Towering cliffs to the east cast long shadows over the trail.

fields.name: On a short stretch of beach
fields.description: You are on a short stretch of beach which continues to the north and south. A path disappears into dense scrub to the east. A cross has been drawn roughly on the sand here with a stick, perhaps as a warning.

fields.name: At a sharp w/n bend on a trail
fields.description: Thick scrub surrounds this trail on all sides. It bends sharply to the north and the west. The cliffs of fire loom over you from far above to the east.

fields.name: On a long stretch of beach near a cave
fields.description: You are on a long stretch of beach which continues to the north and the south. There is a cave at the base of a huge cliff to the east.

fields.name: In a dim cave
fields.description: You are in a small, dim cave. The sour smell of stale blood lingers in the air. A wooden cage hangs from the roof. A hot wind blows in from the cavern mouth to the west.

fields.name: At the south end of the beach
fields.description: You are at the south end of the beach, which rolls away to the north. A steep trail to the south leads up to a high clifftop and another to the east disappears under two huge cliffs.

fields.name: On a high clifftop
fields.description: You are standing at the edge of a high cliff. The ocean crashes against its base hundreds of metres below you on the south, west and east sides. A trail goesdown to the beach to the north. There is a battered corpse lying here.

fields.name: Between two cliffs
fields.description: You stand at the base of two immense cliffs to the north and south. Steep paths lead west and east. You hear a distant rumbling coming from the south- east.

fields.name: In a steep w/e valley
fields.description: You are in a steep valley which slopes downward to the west. Cliffs loom over the valley on the north and south sides.

fields.name: At the base of a set of stone steps
fields.description: You stand before a set of stone steps carved into the cliff face which lead up out of sight. A path goes west into a valley, and another goes south towards a volcano.

fields.name: At the mouth of a volcano
fields.description: You stand at the mouth of a smouldering volcano which frequently belches steam into the air and colours the sky red. A narrow path leads back into the cliffs to the north.

fields.name: At the top of stone steps
fields.description: You are at the top of a set of stone steps which lead back down to the base of the cliff. A huge tower of black rock stands to your east, its top vanishing amongst the red clouds. A narrow cliff-top path winds north.

fields.name: At a dead-end
fields.description: You have come to a dead-end. Huge chasms surround you on all sides except the south. A disfigured corpse bent to an offensive angle lies on the ground here.

fields.name: In the tower's entry hall
fields.description: You are in the large entry hall of the tower. The walls and floor are sculpted of a strange blue stone. An archway to the west leads back outside, a red rimmed door goes north and a green rimmed one east.

fields.name: In a small circular room
fields.description: You are in a small circular room whose walls are made of green stone. A black rimmed door goes west.

fields.name: In a small circular room
fields.description: You are in a small circular room whose walls are made of blue stone. A black rimmed door goes south.

fields.name: In a rectangular room
fields.description: You are in a dim rectangular room. A black rimmed door goes south, a blue rimmed one north and a red rimmed one east.

fields.name: At the base of spiral stairs
fields.description: You are at the base of spiral stairs which wind up into the second floor of the tower. A black rimmed door goes west.

fields.name: At the top of spiral stairs
fields.description: You stand at the top of spiral stairs which lead back down to the first floor of the tower. Narrow corridors go west and south.

fields.name: In a dark crypt
fields.description: You are in a large dark crypt. An old stone sarcophagus sits in the centre of the room. A passageway goes east.

fields.name: At a three way junction
fields.description: You are at a three way junction in the corridor. You can go north, west and south. There is a tiny crack in the wall to the east.

fields.name: In a small square room
fields.description: You are in a small square room. A narrow passage goes east and there is a door in the west wall.

fields.name: In a cramped smelly cell
fields.description: You are in a cramped and smelly cell. The walls and floor are covered in fresh blood stains. There is a door in the east wall.

fields.name: At a w/n bend in the passage
fields.description: You are at a west/north bend in the passage.

fields.name: At the base of spiral stairs
fields.description: You are at the base of spiral stairs which wind up to the third floor of the tower. A passage goes east.

fields.name: At the top of spiral stairs
fields.description: You are at the top of spiral stairs which lead down to the second floor of the tower. A very dark corridor goes east.

fields.name: In a hidden alcove
fields.description: You are in a hidden alcove. The air is thick with dust - obviously nobody has been here for a long time. A secret passage goes west.

fields.name: In a gold room
fields.description: You are in a square golden room. Doors go in all directions.

fields.name: In a bronze room
fields.description: You are in a square bronze room. Doors go in all directions.

fields.name: In a silver room
fields.description: You are in a square silver room. Doors go in all directions.

fields.name: In a copper room
fields.description: You are in a square copper room. Doors go in all directions.

fields.name: At the base of spiral stairs
fields.description: You are at the base of spiral stairs which lead up to the fourth floor of the tower. The floor here is covered with scorch marks. A door goes south.

fields.name: At the top of spiral stairs
fields.description: You stand at the top of spiral stairs which lead down to the third floor of the tower. A narrow gloomy passage goes west.

fields.name: In a large well-lit chamber
fields.description: You are in a large well-lit chamber. There are bizarre patterns carved into the black stone walls. A passage goes east.

fields.name: At a dead-end
fields.description: You are at a dead-end. A passage goes back west. There are pools of water on the floor here.

fields.name: In a large well-lit chamber
fields.description: You are in a large well-lit chamber. There are bizarre patterns carved into the black stone walls. A passage goes east.

fields.name: bottle of water
fields.description: Lying on the ground here is a bottle of stagnant looking water. Tiny creatures swim in the murky brown liquid.

fields.name: potion
fields.description: On the floor of the cave is a sparkling potion which glows faintly. There is enough for at least four swigs.

fields.name: black wand
fields.description: Clutched in the bloody hand of the corpse is a strange black wand.

fields.name: volcanic jewel
fields.description: Sitting on the edge of the volcano is what appears to be a lump of magma. At closer inspection it seems to be one of the rare volcanic jewels you did not believe existed.

fields.name: scroll
fields.description: The lifeless hand of the corpse is wrapped tightly around a scroll, from which fresh ink is dripping.

fields.name: sword
fields.description: There is a sword with clotted blood on its hilt here.

fields.name: Elfsword
fields.description: There is a beautiful elven sword with a blade of magical silver here.

fields.name: shortsword
fields.description: There is a shortsword with a chipped blade here. It has obviously seen a lot of wear.

fields.name: sarcophagus
fields.description: Dust rises from the sarcophagus which has not been moved for years.

fields.name: key
fields.description: There is a key in the sarcophagus.

fields.name: door
fields.description: There is a door in the west wall.

fields.name: magic staff
fields.description: There is a magical staff here. It pulses with its own foul life.

fields.name: huge black stone
fields.description: A huge black stone has been placed right in front of the western exit, preventing movement in that direction.

fields.name: lantern
fields.description: In a corner you see an dusty lantern.

fields.name: ruby
fields.description: A delicately carved ruby lies on the floor here.

fields.name: sceptre
fields.description: Resting at the centre of the room is the white sceptre, glowing brilliantly in the dimness.

fields.name: diamond
fields.description: Resting amid tiny patches of ice is a magnificent diamond.

fields.name: magic dagger
fields.description: There is a faintly glowing magic dagger lying here.

fields.name: dead kobold
fields.description: The slashed body of the kobold lies here in a pool of its own green blood.

fields.name: dead maniac
fields.description: The maniac lies dead here with the insane grin still on his face.

fields.name: dead elf
fields.description: The body of the Elven warrior lies here, somehow looking calm even in death.

fields.name: dead gargoyle
fields.description: The gargoyle's stone body has been reduced to a pile of rubble.

fields.name: dead green statue
fields.description: The green statue lies here, lifeless yet again.

fields.name: dead blue statue
fields.description: The blue statue lies here, lifeless yet again.

fields.name: dead mummy
fields.description: The mummy's rotted body looks the same as it did during its short 'life'.

fields.name: Marcus' body
fields.description: The battered body of the old mage lies on the ground here.

fields.name: Helena's body
fields.description: Helena's bloodstained body bears an expression of horror on its face.

fields.name: pile of bones
fields.description: The skeleton is now a heap of lifeless bones.

fields.name: dead fire demon
fields.description: The fire demon has become a foul smelling molten lump.

fields.name: dead ice demon
fields.description: The ice demon has been reduced to a crumbling wedge of ice.

fields.name: Elrem's body
fields.description: Elrem's eyes still show pure hatred in his contorted corpse.

fields.name: caged elf
fields.description: A majestic elven warrior is trapped here in a primitive cage. He looks towards you hopefully.

fields.name: magic bow
fields.description: There is a well-made magic bow here.

fields.name: ship
fields.description: The priests' ship is waiting in the bay to the north, ready to take you back to the Main Hall.

fields.text: The way westward is blocked by the huge black stone. It is too heavy to move.
As you wave the black wand, cracks appear all over the stone. It begins to hum and throb and then suddenly explodes in a cloud of blue flame, clearing the way westward.

ON THE FIRST, RED HOLDS THE KEY,
ON THE SECOND, SET MY FRIENDS FREE,
ON THE THIRD YOU'LL WANT A LIGHT,
ON THE FOURTH BE READY TO FIGHT...

fields.name: Kobold
fields.description: An evil looking kobold probes the ground here with his rusty shortsword. When he sees you he delivers a grunt of annoyance.

fields.name: Maniac
fields.description: A ragged looking fighter wearing old leather armour prods his captive in the cage. When he turns to look at you, you see an insane grin on his haggard face. He is obviously mad. The maniac draws a sword and swings it with menace.

fields.name: Elf
fields.description: Freed from the cage, the elf thanks you heartily and pledges you his aid until the white sceptre is retrieved.

fields.name: Gargoyle
fields.description: Suddenly the sky echoes with a hideous cry. A tall stone gargoyle descends from the clouds and lands before you. It hisses aggressively.

fields.name: Green statue
fields.description: As soon as you enter, a green statue in the centre of the room springs to life and approaches, laughing hysterically. 'wrong way, adventurer!'

fields.name: Blue statue
fields.description: As soon as you enter, a blue statue in the centre of the room springs to life and approaches, laughing hysterically. 'wrong way, adventurer!'

fields.name: Mummy
fields.description: An ancient mummy leaning against the wall suddenly awakens, stirred by the smell of fresh blood. It moans pathetically and stumbles forward.

fields.name: Marcus
fields.description: A tired looking mage in white robes huddles in the corner of the cell. When he sees you enter his eyes widen with hope.

fields.name: Helena
fields.description: The mage's beautiful apprentice sits next to him. She casts you a brief smile which you take as a 'thank you' and then stands up.

fields.name: Skeleton
fields.description: Gloating over his two prisoners is a tall animated skeleton. Hearing your entry he whips around and howls angrily.

fields.name: Fire demon
fields.description: Floating over the bottom step is a blazing fire demon, flames licking at its feet. It advances, shrieking, 'Try to get by me, fools!'

fields.name: Ice demon
fields.description: An ice demon stands where the stairs were before. 'I wonder what happened to the way down?' it laughs hysterically.

fields.name: Elrem
fields.description: A tall man materializes before you. He has long, dark hair and he is wearing red robes. He booms, 'I am the Elrem that you seek! Now, prove yourself in battle!' He produces a long staff from nowhere.

fields.question: How do I get through Level 2 of the tower?
How do I get through Level 3 of the tower?

fields.answer: You need one item found outside the tower, and one item found within level 2 itself. Remember to search inside items you find on level 2.
The key to the locked door is inside the sarcophagus, west of the stairs down to level 1.
To pass the black stone, you need to use the black wand. (WAVE WAND or USE WAND)

First, look for the lantern on Level 2 if you didn't already find it. Level 3 is a room maze that might take a bit to map. The stairs up are are near the Copper room and the stairs down are near the Gold room.
Starting in the Gold room, go north, east, and north. (East, south, and north also works.) To get back out, starting from the Copper room, go west twice.
